title: ===Is Shaco a good jungler and is he hard?===
body:
I really like role of being jungler and my friends tell me that {{champion:35}} is good but I looked on the forums and someone people say he is hard should I get him or

{{champion:421}} please leave some comments thank you!

replies.body:
Shaco is a high risk, high reward champ that is kinda hard to play... at first but after a couple of games, you get the feel for him.
I remember the first time I played Shaco, I immediately bought him after that beautiful game. Anyway, he's not to difficult, he just requires a bit of thought more that most junglers.
The only thing that's hard about Shaco is trying to stay relevant to your team after 20 minutes.

> [{quoted}](name=Ezreal God,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tgYEaezU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-18T05:20:21.634+0000)
>
> The only thing that's hard about Shaco is trying to stay relevant to your team after 20 minutes.

And trying not to accidently die to the enemies AoE spells with your 10 MR and 1000 HP
his early ganks are creepy but in late game hes kinda turned into a minor champ...
shaco does nothing late game... i always hate having one on my team

Shaco is a good jungle to train your map awareness, to counter jungle and when to go in and when not to. There are many different ways to play Shaco, and runes if you really want to have fun with him. Try him out, you won't regret it but as every jungler's bane learn to bank on your own accord, not be forced into a gank my yelling team mates. 

For some tips you can watch Shaclone on youtube.
Thanks a lot for the comment I really appreciate it :D
Yes he is good, yes he is hard if you are new to the game or new to jungling
I think Shaco is good especially with his Q for ganks
